translation: Arjuna said, "I wish to learn about Nature and the Spirit, the field and the knower of the field, knowledge and that which ought to be known, O Kesava."
commentary: 13.1 Prakritim the Prakriti (matter)? Purusham the Purusha (Spirit or Soul)? f and? Eve even? the field the field? Kshetrajnam the knower of the field? Eve even? f and? This this? veditum to know? I wish (I) wish? Knowledge knowledge? jnyeyam what ought to be known? f and? Keshava O Kesava.Commentary In some of the books you will not find this verse. If you include this verse also? the number of verses
